comments:

gtk_tree_view_column_get_fixed_width.  Here is a stack trace from a user on IRC:

easy way to reproduce: In a fresh install of 3.0.2 select Window/Preferences,
then display of Java/Editor/Templates will trigger this error. The template
preferences page is unavailable.
Version-field should actually read "3.0.2", but this choice is unavailable.

For some reason, the AMD64 did not get built with the correct OS class that
contains the new native introduced with bug 51079.

Attaching correct shared library next.

Created an attachment (id=19516)
contains the missing native call for 3.0.2

The native amd64 libraries for 3.0.2 have been released to the 
org.eclipse.swt.gtk64 R3_0_maintainance branch. They contain the missing 
native call. Leaving PR opened until a patch is issued with Releng.

verified the patch issued by releng contains the missing native JNI call. Build
starts up and self hosts fine with the patch.

Veronika notified Releng that the top link on the download page (download GTK64)
does not mention the patch yet. Releng to update site.

closing PR.

Sonia,

On the download page http://eclipse.org/downloads/index.php, it is smart and 
it knows what platform you are on and creates a link to the correct platform 
download e.g. on Windows "Download now: Eclipse SDK 3.0.2 
<http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/eclipse/downloads/drops/R-
3.0.2-200503110845/eclipse-SDK-3.0.2-win32.zip>, Windows."

On AMD64, it creates a link to the 3.0.2 linux gtk AMD64 build, however, it 
does not show you the click through.  The instructions for upgrading are 
therefore not shown.

Is there a way to get the click through in this case?

The clickthroughs are broken on eclipse.org but work on the mirrors. I have fix
the php script on this page so eclipse.org users are forced through the
clickthroughs, then through the find a mirror script.

Hello guys,

It's not clear where the fix can be obtained from. It's definitely not available
through the Eclipse Update Manager and the SWT download for AMD64 in the Eclipse
3.0.2 page is still broken.

Could somebody post instructions? I'm using the version attached to this report
for now.

Thanks,

This is what the download page says. It contains the link to the zip/patch 
file.

The fix is to upgrade to version 3.0.2.1 of the fragment 
org.eclipse.swt.gtk64.  

The upgrade is available at:

	http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-swt-
home/patch/org.eclipse.swt.gtk64_3.0.2.zip

Download the zip file and extract it into the plugin folder of your Eclipse 
3.0.2 install.
*** Bug 101594 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
